thread.title_full: Carolina Panthers vs. Seattle Seahawks Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015

author: Tony Tellez
title: Carolina Panthers vs. Seattle Seahawks Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Seattle -7 points 
Over Under Total: 41 1/2 points 
Money Line: Seahawks -300 odds and Panthers +250 odds. 
Notes: Carolina comes off the bye week. The team is 4-0 following the 37-23 road victory in week four to the Tampa Bay Buccaneers as a -3   went over 40 points. The Panthers win despite 244 yards of offense. They forced five Tampa Bay turnovers and had a +4 turnover margin. Cam Newton threw for 124 yards and had two passing touchdowns. He contributed on the ground with 12 rushes for 51 yards. Carolina’s defense allowed the Buccaneers 411 yards with 270 passing yards. The team is sixth in the NFL in scoring offense by producing 27 points per game. 
Seattle falls to 2-3 with the 27-24 road overtime defeat on Sunday to the Cincinnati Bengals as a +3 point wagering underdog. The game total went over 44 ½ points. Seattle has two overtime road losses by three points on the year. Seattle couldn’t hold a 24-7 lead after three quarters. The Seahawks defense allowed 419 yards to the Bengals with 331 passing yards and two touchdown passes thrown by Andy Dalton. Seattle is now ninth in the NFL in points allowed by giving up 19.6 points per game. 
Carolina Panthers versus Seattle Seahawks Free Pick : This NFL
